text: Ara tomadera madhye yara stri rekhe mara yaya, tara (strigana) nijera cara masa dasa dina apeksaya thakabe. Atahpara yakhana tara tadera â€˜iddatakala purna karabe, takhana yathabidhi nijedera jan'ya ya karabe tate tomadera kono papa ne'i. Ara tomara ya karo allahâ€Œ se samparke samyaka khabara rakhena
